name: A Hard Day's Knight
description:
As the new Head Knight of the Royal Guard, your quest, if you choose to accept it,  is to rescue the Crown Princess from the clutches of a supposedly evil dragon.  

Set in a Medieval-lite fantasy world, A Hard Day's Knight is a playful send-up of common fantasy tropes. Click through and make friends, or battle the dragon, all in an effort to save the princess, the King's pride, and your honour!

Like this? Follow me at https://www.tumblr.com/blog/i-evans-writes for more!
